name: Teraburst
overview: Teraburst is a classic 'shoot-em-up' arcade game made by Konami in 1998. The game is set in 2017. An invasion of UFOs has appeared and started to invade Earth. You are charged to blast the aliens back into outer space with a hand-held, recoiling machine gun, homing missiles and Napalm bombs. The game progresses through four stages of aliens.
